page.title: 06HOUSING
page.content: In the area bounded by the Northolme, Trinity street,Bridge street and Ropery road,most of the houses are terraced.Since 1971 many of these houses have been improved with the help of grants,new roofs,bathrooms,new windows and indoor toilets have been added and many of the houses have been modernised.Between Sandsfield lane and Lea road there are semi_detatched houses with front gardens.In some areas traffic problems occur as cars have to be parked in the streets where houses have no garages.There is a large area of detatched family housing on the uphill Estate the Welmar Estate off the Avenue and the Enness Estates off Middlefield lane.There are many council houses in the uphill area.Some of these were built after the war and some more recently for people who came to work in Gainsborough from London.
